definition: Temporary; not permanent; passing; transient; for a limited period of time. This word is commonly used to describe something that is not permanent or long-lasting, but rather exists or occurs for a short duration or until a certain point in time.

examples.english: The construction site is temporarily closed.

examples.german: Die vorübergehende Lösung hat gut funktioniert.

examples.english: The power outage was only temporary.

examples.german: Die vorübergehende Abwesenheit des Chefs wurde gut überbrückt.
examples.english: The temporary absence of the boss was well managed.

examples.german: Die vorübergehende Schließung des Geschäfts hat zu finanziellen Verlusten geführt.
examples.english: The temporary closure of the business resulted in financial losses.
